# Essential Stuff

## Fonts

```html
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Quicksand:wght@400;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
```

## Border Radius

```css
--radius-midle: 20px;
--radius-circle: 50%;
```

## Transition

```css
--transition-1: 250ms ease;
--transition-2: 500ms ease;
--transition-3: 1000ms ease;
```
